name: Commemoration of Weser
obverse_inscriptions: L·A·WESER ORDFÖRANDE MÄSTARE I ST·JOHS·LOGEN ST·ERIK
reverse: Within a wreath of oak on the right and olive on the left open at the top the stems crossed at the bottom where they are surmounted by the square compasses and a gavel erect interlaced the inscription in two lines between the branches at the top a radiant star formed by two triangles braced.
